CatDescriptText: Mr. George Hamilton, 2313 Reed Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 14, 1958, pg. 8 with question: "Do you think ministers should invest in business enterprises for profit, or become executives or directors of such concern?" answer reads: "No, because a minister takes up most of his time in church activity."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of George Hamilton wearing straw hat with light colored band, moustache, and light colored arrow patterned shirt, standing on sidewalk with street car and buildings with signs including one which reads "...osmetics SUN"
